text: The 1990 United States Soccer Federation presidential election was held in Orlando on August 6, 1990 to determine the next President of the United States Soccer Federation. Alan I. Rothenberg was elected after defending Werner Fricker & Paul Stiehl on the first ballot after joining the election only a few weeks before the election. ==References== Category:Presidents of the United States Soccer Federation Category:1990 in American soccer
title: 1990 United States Soccer Federation presidential election
